    • confirmOrder

      public String confirmOrder(String productName, int quantity, ProductBLL productBLL) throws Exception
      sets the product to be ordered and checks if the quantity required by the client is available; if not, the client will be informed of the under-stock
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product selected
      quantity - the quantity ordered of the selected product
      Returns:
      the content of the bill generated when a new order is confirmed
      Throws:
      Exception

    • columnNames

      public Object[] columnNames()
      Returns:
      the header of the JTable generated when "View orders" button is pressed

    • rowData

      public Object[][] rowData()
      Returns:
      the data to populate the JTable generated when "View orders" button is pressed

    • cancelOrder

      public int cancelOrder(int id)
      cancels an available order by setting its available attribute from "Yes" to "No" and by putting back in the stock the products which were ordered
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the order to be cancelled
      Returns:
      1 if the order requested is already cancelled, else 0
